metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9369 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Sympa 6.2.38 through 6.2.52 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (disk consumption from temporary files, and a flood of notifications to listmasters) via a series of requests with malformed parameters.

criterions.comment: sympa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
